name: Federal Real Property Assistance Program
objective: To convey surplus Federal Real Property for educational purposes at fair market value.
sub_agency_name: Office of Human Resources and Administration
assistance_types: Sale, Exchange, or Donation of Property or Goods
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949, Section 203(k), as amended,.
Department of Education Organization Act of 1979.

rules_regulations: Regulations: 34 CFR 12; Pamphlet: How to Acquire Surplus Federal Real Property for Educational Purposes; Guidelines: Application outline and preparation assistance can be obtained at the zone office level.
